fullText: Mr. Logan has created a work that is both intellectually stimulating and deeply moving, a portrait of an artist whose greatest creations may have emerged from his most tormented moments.
dtliExcerpt: Mr. Logan has created a work that is both intellectually stimulating and deeply moving, a portrait of an artist whose greatest creations may have emerged from his most tormented moments.
bwwExcerpt: “Red,” which arrives as fresh, yes, as paint from its recent premiere at the Donmar Warehouse in London, initially registers as a visceral exercise in art appreciation. Fortunately though, it turns out to be more a study in artist appreciation, a portrait of an angry and brilliant mind that asks you to feel the shape and texture of thoughts.
showScoreExcerpt: Mr. Logan has created a work that is both intellectually stimulating and deeply moving, a portrait of an artist whose greatest creations may have emerged from his most tormented moments.
